title: Inexplicable Grace - An Adoptee Journeys Home
description: Within the pages of this account you will be taken on a heartfelt journey from child adoptee to reunited adoptee and all the stops along the way. The author navigates the roller coaster ride of emotions that come along with being a part of the adoption triad of adoptive parents, birth parents and adoptee. Grace plays an integral role along this journey that culminates in resolution on every conceivable level.
author: Peggy Cole Ashman
